summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting easements for storm drain purposes over a portion of Lot 3, Block 1, Morgan Terrace Addition (West Seattle Alki - Contract 7, Sewer Separation); and over a portion of S. Winthrop St. (Street Vacation - C.F. 285734); and accepting an easement over a portion of Lot 124, Block 14, C.D. Hillman's Meadow Gardens Addition, Division No. 2, for sanitary sewer purposes (S. Juniper St., et al, Sanitary Sewer).
